title: Personal income in California - income per capita 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Income in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Income in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from '03 to '06, roughly constant from '06 to '08, and finally slightly increasing from '08 to '12.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year '05 and '06.
Maximum Income in U.S. dollars, about 48798.0 was reported at Year '12
Minimum Income in U.S. dollars about 35415.0 was reached at Year '03
